data.name: Voidwalkers - Soul Hunters : Esos Weapon Pack
data.detailed_description:
Purchase the Esos Weapon Pack to receive seven new items.

Included in the Esos Weapon Pack:

The Curved Sword - The standard sword used in the faraway land of Esos.

The Esos Shield - A shield used by the knights in Esos.

The King's Crown - A crown worn by the king of Esos.

The Esos Helmet - A helmet worn by the knights in Esos.

The Golden Dagger - A dagger made of gold.

The Sacrificial Dagger - A dagger used for sacrifices. It is said that the sacrificed souls are still trapped inside.

The Queen's Golden Necklace - A necklace made of pure gold. It has a ruby placed within its center. It was worn by the Queen of Esos.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB / GTX 1050 2GB or AMD Radeon HD 7850.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 sound device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-2600 CPU @ 3.40 GHz - 3.70 GHZ (Or equivalent AMD CPU)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 (Or equivalent AMD GPU)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 12 sound device
